attributes.review: Here I was so ready to elect the BEST president Donald Trump. Then after waiting an ENTIRE 3 MONTHS the app had finally downloaded. I clicked on the app ready to to support the one and only Cheeto until the app decided to retaliate and stab me in the KIDNEY and STOMACH 😡😡😡. This app is very violent and currently I’m in the hospital because of it. Horrible app do NOT recommend.
attributes.title: THIS APP IS GARBAGE 🤢🤮

attributes.review: I have never seen a more bugged out app than this. My phone crashed multiple times and I had to completely restart it to make my phone even usable again. Im deleting the app and I suggest all of you do too.

attributes.title: roll up to the party with my crazy pink wig

attributes.review: I am not a part of this gen z thing but this app led to my phone breaking because it caused all my other apps to start crashing. Horrible user interface, it was hard to read any of the words because the app crashed every time.
attributes.title: This app is hellish

attributes.review: When I opened up the app after it took a week to download, I saw lots of pop ups on my screen, So I clicked on one thinking is a message from Donald J Trump, But it was a virus detected on my IPhone! Now I have to get a new IPhone, preferably the IPhone 4, There is no problems with them! Anyways, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. -Karen Smith
attributes.title: Terrible App!

attributes.review: When I bought this app I was PRO TRUMP now I am not this app should be taken down I put my number in so that I can get updates it hacked my phone now all I get are ads on everything and I just don’t recommend it it takes up so much storage for what there IS NO NEED
attributes.title: Trump app

attributes.review: This app belongs to a homophobic and racist man who doesn’t want people from other countries to be successful. He does everything possible to make sure immigrants are down and sent out of ‘his’ country. He doesn’t care about their mistreatment in the camps. “Make America Great Again”, but for who?
attributes.title: MAGA for who?

attributes.review: I downloaded this app only wanting to support my president Donald Trump, but even though I tried to turn off the notifications, it wouldn’t stop harassing me for money. I don’t have enough money to support trumps campaign I’m only a broke college student, so please stop bombarding me for money.
attributes.title: Demanding!
